name: Glass of Ganymede
description:
Glass of Ganymede is a visual novel developed in Unity using the Fungus plugin, featuring an original setting and story.

In Glass of Ganymede the player takes control of Jax, the owner of a bar located in a city floating over Venus. Throughout the game’s short run time Jax interacts with three customers alongside his waitress and her daughter. Conversations can go differently depending on the choices the player makes.

I performed all dialogue writing for this game as well as came up with the original concept alongside Mike Ferreira.
